thread.title: 'Consumer Reports' Pulls Tesla Model S Recommendation
thread.title_full: 'Consumer Reports' Pulls Tesla Model S Recommendation - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Consumer Reports' Pulls Tesla Model S Recommendation
text: Tesla — the electric car company beloved by environmentalists and the auto press — has hit a rough patch. A rave review from Consumer Reports has been reversed, and now Tesla's Model S is no longer recommended by the magazine. A self-driving feature introduced recently has also led to some hair raising moments behind the wheel documented online. »
